text: Hamonandi kasone, ki pes az sumo ʙudand, ʙo nerui ʙestar va doroivu farzandonn ʙestar, Onho az nasiʙi xes ʙahramand sudand. Sumo niz az nasiʙi xes ʙahramand sudaed, hamcunon, ki kasone, ki pes az sumo ʙudaand, az nasiʙi xes ʙahramand suda ʙudand. Sumo suxanoni ʙotil gufted, hamcunon, ki onho suxani ʙotil meguftand. A'moli onon dar dunjovu oxirat nociz gardid va zijonmand sudand
